topic.title: Advanced Annotations View
topic.shortdesc: Learn about advanced features and options available in the Annotations View.

body.p: The Advanced Annotations View provides additional tools and configuration options for power users. Here you can filter, search, and manage annotations with greater flexibility, customize the display, and integrate with other review workflows.

ul.li: Advanced filtering and sorting of annotations
Export and import of annotation data

body.p: Refer to this section for tips and best practices on using these advanced capabilities.
